error.20: An account already exist with this email.
error.30: The mail provider was ban because to many robots are doning automatic registers.
error.40: Your password isn't enough strong. Add some alpha, numeric and special chars.
error.50: The sent mail address is not valid.
error.60: Any account exists with this mail. Please, register!

account.description: Here you can delete your account. To do it, enter your password and press the submit button. Be careful, this deletion will be definitive. After you press the button, your account will be deleted and you will be definitively disconnected.

activation.activationCode-placeholder: You can find activation in the mail sent just after your registration.

register.password-confirmation-helpBlock: Password and confirmation fields should be equals.

read.label: I read and accept Terms of Service.

help.activation: To activate your account, please enter the activation code provided in our mail.

delete-account.title: Are you sure to delete your account?
delete-account.message: Be careful, your account will be DELETED, this cannot be undone. After you accpet, your account will be deleted and you will be logout.

help.forgot-your-password: You have forgotten your password? Please send us your email, you will receive a mail which will help you step by step to recover your accesses.
help.profile: This form allow you to update your profile. Update data, then click on "Save" button.

link.forgot-your-password-title: Go to our form which will help you to create a new one.

message.404-explanation: The requested page doesn't more exists.

forgot-your-password-nextStep.10: A mail to update your password have been sent. Please, check your mailbox.
forgot-your-password-nextStep.20: A temporary password has been sent by mail. Please, check your mailbox.
forgot-your-password-nextStep.30: Administrators have been informed, they will contact you by mail as soon as possible.

message.logout-successful-explanations: Your disconnection has been logged. Hope to see you soon!

register.10: You can login to the website.
register.20: An administrator will activate your account. You will be alert by a mail when it will be done.
register.30: To verify your mail address, we have sent a mail with a link. Click it to finalize your registration.

message.password-confirmed: Your password and its confirmation match.
message.please-login: To unlock access to this page, please login.

description.forgotten-password: This process help you to recover your forgotten password.

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.
